name: What Looms in the Dark
description: You awake in a dark room, somehow your shackles have gotten loose. You are free! But how do you escape the dark room?  With your phone, point it in the direction you wish to move towards. Then, tilt the phone forward to move forward and tilt the phone backwards to move back. Listen for gusts of wind as hints for where to go. It is recommended to play with headphones. Don't let your kidnapper catch you!
